CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Integrate Chat notification with Meeting RSVP status
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Teams users will be able to control how they get notified in meeting chats through RSVP to their meetings. When you decline a meeting, you will not receive notifications or see the chats in chat list; when you accept a meeting, you will receive notification for all new messages.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Integrate Chat notification with Meeting RSVP status
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Teams users will be able to control how they get notified in meeting chats through RSVP to their meetings. When you decline a meeting, you will not receive notifications or see the chats in chat list; when you accept a meeting, you will receive notification for all new messages.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Organize and reorder folders in the new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: Users can arrange folders in any desired order effortlessly by dragging and dropping the folders in the position that they want. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Organize and reorder folders in the new Outlook for Windows and web
OldVersion.description: Users can arrange folders in any desired order effortlessly by dragging and dropping the folders in the position that they want. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview portal now supports user search functionality
CurrentVersion.description: Our global search feature now enables you to search for users within your organization. You’ll find basic information such as names and email addresses. Additionally, if you have role management privileges, you can view assigned role groups and admin units. This means now you can search for navigational results, data, learning resources, and also for users within your organization.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview portal now supports user search functionality
OldVersion.description: Our global search feature now enables you to search for users within your organization. You’ll find basic information such as names and email addresses. Additionally, if you have role management privileges, you can view assigned role groups and admin units. This means now you can search for navigational results, data, learning resources, and also for users within your organization.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Updated conversation actions on Outlook for Android
CurrentVersion.description: Currently, when viewing a message, you can access the available actions in the top-right corner. We are updating these actions to be at the bottom of the screen with the ability to customize the order and placement of the actions to suit your needs.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Updated conversation actions on Outlook for Android
OldVersion.description: Currently, when viewing a message, you can access the available actions in the top-right corner. We are updating these actions to be at the bottom of the screen with the ability to customize the order and placement of the actions to suit your needs.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Work Hours and Location in My Day
CurrentVersion.description: Work Hours and Location information will now be available in My Day pane in Outlook when using agenda view. Users will be able to update their Work Hours and Location information from My Day and also see who is coming to Office. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and web. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Work Hours and Location in My Day
OldVersion.description: Work Hours and Location information will now be available in My Day pane in Outlook when using agenda view. Users will be able to update their Work Hours and Location information from My Day and also see who is coming to Office. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and web. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams menu bar icon with Presence on Mac
CurrentVersion.description: Introduction of a Menu Bar icon with a flyout for common workflows that reduces clicks and simplifies checking for at-a-glance information like the presence status.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams menu bar icon with Presence on Mac
OldVersion.description: Introduction of a Menu Bar icon with a flyout for common workflows that reduces clicks and simplifies checking for at-a-glance information like the presence status.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Unified Create button in Viva Engage
CurrentVersion.description: This feature brings a new way for users to create posts, communities etc. through a centralized creation button in Viva Engage. Currently, Engage users need to go to different locations in the application for different creation types - a post, community, etc. Starting in October 2024, a Viva Engage user will be able to create the different types of content already enabled for them, using a centralized creation button. This new feature eases the process of creation and helps users quickly discover the various creation options they are licensed to use.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Unified Create button in Viva Engage
OldVersion.description: This feature brings a new way for users to create posts, communities etc. through a centralized creation button in Viva Engage. Currently, Engage users need to go to different locations in the application for different creation types - a post, community, etc. Starting in October 2024, a Viva Engage user will be able to create the different types of content already enabled for them, using a centralized creation button. This new feature eases the process of creation and helps users quickly discover the various creation options they are licensed to use.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Categorize single items in conversation view in new Outlook for Windows and Web
CurrentVersion.description: This functionality will allow users to categorize individual emails within the conversation view, enhancing organization and tracking. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Categorize single items in conversation view in new Outlook for Windows and Web
OldVersion.description: This functionality will allow users to categorize individual emails within the conversation view, enhancing organization and tracking. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights - Analyst query notification email
CurrentVersion.description: We are launching a new feature for a Viva Insights Analyst who will be able to receive a query notification email that provides them with the status of their recently completed query. The notification email will be triggered both for a successful and failed query executed in Advanced Insights (Analyst workbench). Both custom queries and Power BI reports are in the scope of this feature. The Viva Insights Analyst can access the Analyst query notification email from their inbox.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights - Analyst query notification email
OldVersion.description: We are launching a new feature for a Viva Insights Analyst who will be able to receive a query notification email that provides them with the status of their recently completed query. The notification email will be triggered both for a successful and failed query executed in Advanced Insights (Analyst workbench). Both custom queries and Power BI reports are in the scope of this feature. The Viva Insights Analyst can access the Analyst query notification email from their inbox.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to take control during screensharing on Web
CurrentVersion.description: This update enables meeting participants using the Microsoft Teams web app to use the "Take control" function to request control while another person is screen-sharing.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to give and take control during screensharing on Web
OldVersion.description: The new update will allow the users to be able to use the give and take control function during screenshare on web similarly to how the users are used to do on the desktop version of the application.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot web grounding now available in the Copilot app in Teams and Outlook
CurrentVersion.description: Ground your Copilot chat conversations with the latest information from the web in the Copilot app in Teams and Outlook

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Web grounding for Microsoft 365 Copilot Business Chat in Teams and Outlook
OldVersion.description: Ground conversations in the latest information from the web in Business Chat web mode.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): BizChat - Copilot agents available in Business Chat web mode
CurrentVersion.description: In Business Chat web mode, discover and use Copilot agents available for your organization. Agents are custom grounded chats that include specific knowledge sources from work and web.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Page header enhancements
CurrentVersion.description: We’ve made enhancements to the Viva Engage page header for a more streamlined experience. The header now pulls in more relevant content and emphasizes key actions like "Join." Additionally, we’ve reduced the icon size slightly to prevent overlap with background images, ensuring improved visibility and interaction.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Admin Center – Admins can disable ability to send messages in meeting chat before and after the meeting
CurrentVersion.description: We are expanding the existing ‘Meeting chat’ control in Teams Admin Center with two new values, “In-meeting only for everyone” and “In-meeting only except anonymous users.” In Teams Admin Center, admins will see a setting called ‘Meeting chat’ under Meetings > Meeting Policies > Meeting Engagement. Admins can now select from five options in the ‘Meeting chat’ setting: (1) “On for everyone” (2) “On for everyone but anonymous users” (3) “Off” (4) “In-meeting only for everyone” (5) “In-meeting only except anonymous users.”  Admins can select the “In-meeting only” values to disable participants’ ability to send messages in the meeting chat before or after the meeting, for meetings organized by specific users in their tenant. When one of these “In-meeting only” values are selected, participants can read past chat history but no one can send messages in the meeting chat unless the meeting is active.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Improved reporting – Additional report fields in the Time Clock export
CurrentVersion.description: We’ve expanded the functionality of the time clock export report by adding additional fields from Shifts. This enhancement provides you with a more comprehensive and detailed view of your scheduling data, making it easier to analyze and manage workforce activities.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Shifts Graph APIs in beta moved to production (v1.0)
CurrentVersion.description: We are excited to announce that the Shifts Graph APIs have transitioned from beta to production. This change brings enhanced stability and reliability to the APIs, ensuring a seamless experience for developers and users alike.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Archived Teams' schedules no longer visible
CurrentVersion.description: We've improved the schedule view by hiding archived teams' schedules. This reduces clutter, allowing you to focus on active teams and their schedules.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Insert signature into calendar events
CurrentVersion.description: Users can manually insert a signature into a calendar event like they can in the classic outlook. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Mail Merge (Advanced) on Outlook on the Web and new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Mail Merge (Basic) will be improved upon to allow fields to be replaced by values per email address. When Mail Merge (Advanced) is launched, not only will every recipient receive their own email with only their email address in the recipients list, but the emails can further be personalized to include content such as their name. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability for all participants to start collaborative annotations
CurrentVersion.description: All participants in meetings are now able to start collaborative annotations. This will only be available in the new Microsoft Teams experience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability for all participants to start collaborative annotations
OldVersion.description: All participants in meetings are now able to start collaborative annotations. This will only be available in the new Microsoft Teams experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Contact deduplication on New Outlook for Windows and Outlook on the Web
CurrentVersion.description: People are at the center of our lives, and we start every digital connection via contacts. Hence, a clean, up-to-date contact list is critical for better collaboration and productivity. We are happy to announce that cleaning up duplicate contacts just got a lot easier with the de-duplication feature on New Outlook for Windows and Outlook on the Web

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Contact deduplication on New Outlook for Windows and Outlook on the Web
OldVersion.description: People are at the center of our lives, and we start every digital connection via contacts. Hence, a clean, up-to-date contact list is critical for better collaboration and productivity. We are happy to announce that cleaning up duplicate contacts just got a lot easier with the de-duplication feature on New Outlook for Windows and Outlook on the Web
